attributes.action: continue the work to abolish slavery begun by William Wilberforce 200 years ago; thus helping to liberate the estimated 27 million people still enslaved today.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sex slaves, swet-shop workers, child slave labour in chocolate plantations, carpet maufacturers, cockle pickers child soldiers all sold as chattels TODAY IN THE EAST, IN THE WEST, all over the world. They cannot protest, but we can. 
Please support.
